oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Alberta Farm Fresh Producers Locations
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Alberta Farm Fresh Producers Association
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The GIS (.shp) data set was developed by scraping the Alberta Farm Fresh Producers Association website to pull out the names of the Farm Fresh Producers and the latitude and longitude of their location in order that the resulting .csv file could be brought in to ArcGIS for further analysis. The code used in the scrape is available here: mediagestalt.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Alberta
Agriculture
Open Data
Fresh Food
